title: Sound On: Deadly Texas Elementary School Shooting (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Deadly Texas Elementary School Shooting (Radio)
description:
Jim Messina, CEO of the Messina Group discussed President Biden's approval ratings, inflation and the midterm elections. Bloomberg Government elections reporter Greg Giroux spoke about voting and public safety issues, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discuss the deadly Texas elementary school shooting and gun reform policy. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
